list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She acknowledged that I was right.

list_definition.definition: to recognize that someone or something is important or good

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is widely acknowledged as the best football player in the world.

list_definition.mean_english: báo cho ai biết đã nhận được
list_definition.definition: to say (usually in writing) that one has received (something)
